titleStmt.title: A few words in answer to the resolves of some who are called independant-teachers whose gospel and ministry appears to depend upon tythes, or as full a maintenance secured to them by a carnal law, as appears from their own mouths in their judgements, and desires to the present rulers, delivered as followeth / by James Naylor.
titleStmt.author: Naylor, James, 1617?-1660.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
